titles.title: Expressing the opposition of the House of Representatives to any proposal intended to alter current law to allow the Department of Veterans Affairs to bill third-party insurers of veterans who are being treated for service-connected disabilities or injuries.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 3/19/2009--Introduced. Opposes any proposal intended to alter current law to allow the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to bill third-party insurers of veterans being treated for service-connected disabilities or injuries incurred in or aggravated by military service.
